title: Caramel macchiato cheesecake
ingredients: ['175g (6 oz) digestives, crushed', '115g (4 oz) butter, melted', '50g (2 oz) caster sugar', '600g soft cheese, such as Philadelphia', '200g caster sugar', '3 organic eggs', '200ml soured cream or marscapone', '60ml or 4 tablespoons brewed espresso or strong coffee', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', 'For serving', 'whipped cream', 'dulce de leche or thick toffee sauce']
